issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
This was found in the CI run where volume attachment failed in ebs suite,

{noformat}
2015-04-21 06:19:39  INFO | Processing GetVolumeToken request for volume vol-826c00ff

(complete sosreport attached)
fields.summary: Volume attachment fails in w/ EQL

comments.body: from the log this issue doesn't look similar to EUCA-10734, but referencing anyway
[~shaon], is this reproducible? Also how often has this issue been seen?

[~swathi], so far this is only seen in GA run, couldn't reproduce by hand, also in the same sequence few other running bfebs instances, attaching volume succeeded in few other tests. Here is another similar failure while running a bfebs instance on a different sequence which also using EQL,

{noformat}
2015-04-20 18:34:18  INFO | :1429580058294:StatefulMessageSet:VM_START_COMPLETED:10.578s
2015-04-20 18:34:18  INFO | Exporting backend volume vol-3da531ed mapping to vol-3da531ed to NC host IQN iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:9f278a74b7d7

on assigning:impending->assigned(true)

2015-04-20 18:34:18 ERROR | Could not attach volume: Unable to set access for volume: vol-3da531ed
2015-04-20 18:34:18 ERROR | Failed ExportVolume transaction due to: Got null record result. Cannot set connection string
